segments.text: I notice the angled view of this indoor kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window above the sink brightens everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a slippery puddle that could cause a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the counter, dishes are piled up neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets show the cookie jar full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, reaching high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so precarious, like it might collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're risking a fall just for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks safe and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
